SENT.plain: AIM: To study the maternal and fetal outcome in cases of aplastic anemia associated with pregnancy
METHOD: Retrospective analysis of seven cases of aplastic anemia diagnosed during pregnancy
RESULT: Four patients had an overall successful pregnancy outcome
These were all cases of non-severe aplastic anemia
There was one case each of intrauterine and neonatal death in the severe aplastic anemia group
CONCLUSION: Maternal and fetal outcome is poor in severe aplastic anemia
